definition: The market quoted asset is the asset in the pair for which a quote is given, denominated in the base asset, as listed at the exchange.

paragraphs.text: How the Market Quoted Asset Works
A market quoted asset must reference an asset defined under the exchange assets node.
To add a market quoted asset, select Add Market Quoted Asset on the market node menu.
Remember to establish a reference with an asset defined under the exchange assets node.
